root.name: Final Exam
root.description: OverviewFinal Exam is a teen horror themed side-scrolling brawler developed by Mighty Rocket Studio, about a group of teenagers who end up stranded in a ghost town filled with monsters.The game was originally announced as a revival of the mid 2000s Obscure franchise, but the developers chose to it turn into a stand alone project after fans reacted negatively to the game's focus on arcade action and deviation from the original formula.System RequirementsOS: WINDOWS XP SP3/WINDOWS VISTA SP2/WINDOWS 7/WINDOWS 8Processor: AMD/INTEL DUAL-CORE 2.3 GHZ COMPATIBLE SSE2Memory: 2048 MB RAMGraphics: 256 MB 100% DIRECTX 9 AND SHADERS 3.0 COMPATIBLE ATI RADEON 2600XT/NVIDIA GEFORCE 8600 GT/INTEL HD 3000 OR HIGHERDirectX: Version 9.0cHard Drive: 2 GB available space
